summary: THE VEHICLE HAD AN OIL LEAK.  THE DEALER DETERMINED THE LOWER INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKET NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.       *JB    THE VEHICLE HAD AN OIL LEAK.  THE DEALER DETERMINED THE LOWER INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKET NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  ALSO CONSUMER REPORTED A BURNING SMELL COMING FROM THE ENGINE.  AFTER REPAIRS CONSUMER STILL SMELLS SAME BURNING ODOR.
